content: colors of the season combine with contemporary style to complete this crochet throw that s perfect to celebrate autumn easily stitch in red heart super saver using the rich tones featured this log cabin throw is a lovely accent in the family room and looks right at home at the cottage swap out shades to create a whole new blanket when the season changes again video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=2xwwoz3pyqa pattern number wr1846 as pictured on the back cover of the sept/oct crochet today magazine gauge blocks should measure 11 5 square skill level easy
